problems and building partnerships within the team\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There might be a request from the customer, when the customer does not know what their ultimate goal is. The request may sound quite abstract, for example:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":122262,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a86f5eb5-afd5-41b1-8cf4-642c7d51da9f/hr-nt-1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a86f5eb5-afd5-41b1-8cf4-642c7d51da9f/hr-nt-1.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"hr-nt-1.PNG\",\"name\":\"hr-nt-1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a86f5eb5-afd5-41b1-8cf4-642c7d51da9f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":492,\"height\":483},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Next, the team processes the request. There are cases when the customer comes with one request, and after clarifying the details we understand that this is a completely different issue. It is also necessary to define the rules of the game at the very beginning: What are we going to do? How? Why? (see HR Ninja Team process).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ATTENTION:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" We don’t stay in the team on a permanent basis, we don’t do operational, routine tasks.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
